metadata.name: Dos checker
metadata.description: Rule that checks how many request are happening per minute, if it reaches threshhold it creates prevent action.

logging.text: 1 or more Ip addresses are making too many requests, possible dos, executing prevention actions.

script.inline: def alarm = new HashMap(); alarm.timestamp = ctx.execution_time; alarm.message = 'Ip addresses making too many requests'; alarm.result = new ArrayList(); for(def line: ctx.payload.aggregations.group_by_client_ip.buckets){if(line.doc_count >= ctx.metadata.threshold){alarm.result.add(['ip-address': line.key, 'number-requests': line.doc_count])}} return ['_doc' : alarm];
